captions.text: think rock paper scissors as a random game a chance?
that is probably why you aren't winning here's a little science
and dirty psychology to sharpen your game and help you totally
dominate rock paper scissors first
Throw if you're playing against a guy bro paper first
data shows that men often go with the manly rock on the first row
so roll paper to totally a mass killing him
remember to look him in the eye and don't smile when you do it
next row if you just lost
Throw whatever would have beaten your opponent the previous role
so if you just lost to paper
Throw scissors next you're foolish opponent will probably stick with the
past winner and broke paper again
if you won the first row congratulations
now switch it up because losers most often will not stick with the losing row
losers of and bro in a predictable order
if you lost with rock odds are he'll throw paper next
it be lost with paper odds are he'll throw scissors next
cycling through the name rock then paper
then scissors anticipate your opponent's next throw by paying attention to what
he just threw
it will seem like you're reading his mind third
throw most casual players will not throw something
three times in a row so if he throws two rocks
you should throw scissors next because he will probably abandon rock in a sweaty
panic
now you've got him on the ropes and finally
close your eyes the mirror neurons in your brain can force you to copy your
opponent in a split second before a throw
research shows blindfolded players went slightly more
plus how badass is it the school some wanna rock paper scissors with your eyes
closed
that some generation right there now go forth and demolish your opponents
but remember not to gloat instead give them a hug
and tell them not to suck so bad next time
